original_text: Likewise shalt thou do with thine oxen, and with thy sheep: seven days it shall be with his dam; on the eighth day thou shalt give it me.
korean_text: 네 소와 양도 그와 같이 하되 이레 동안 어미와 함께 있게 하다가 여드레 만에 내게 줄지니라

sentences.original_text: Likewise shalt thou do with thine oxen,
seven days it shall be with his dam;
sentences.korean_translation: 이레 동안은 그것이 어미와 함께 있게 하고

sentences.original_text: on the eighth day thou shalt give it me.
